items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a user updates a task status, all team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates must be delivered with 99.9% reliability.

items.title: Shared Task Boards
items.description: Provide a shared board where team members can create, assign, and track tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a new task with title, description, assignee, and due date.
Tasks can be moved between columns representing different statuses.
non_functional: Board should load in under 2 seconds for up to 200 tasks.
UI should be responsive across desktop and mobile devices.

notes: User input was high-level; assumptions made about real-time updates and shared boards as core collaboration features.
